title: Mute Driver
description:
The Driver only types when instructed. The Driver is not allowed to ask or answer questions, or to talk at all.
If anything is unclear the driver raises both hands.

title: Lazy Driver
description: The Driver tries to use the least amount of code to make tests pass.

title: Skeptic Driver
description: The driver follows the rule of three. The driver only writes the simplest possible code to make a test pass. The driver *only* refactors or simplifies code if three test cases show a pattern.
